text:
RELIGION

Bhagavatham: Paramasukhananda, Ramakrishna Math, Mylapore, 5.30 p.m.

Sri Krishna Vaibhavam: V. Gopalasundar, Arunagirinathar Arangam, Kumaran Kundram, Chromepet, 7 p.m.

Poigai Azhwar: M. A. Venkatakrishnan, Parathasarathy Temple, Triplicane, 7.45 p.m.

Namasankeerthanam: Ananthanarayanan, Ayodhya Mandapam, Arya Gowda Rd., T.Nagar, 7 p.m.

Vedanta Treatise: R. Aravindan, C Flat, Harmony, Venkatarathinam Nagar, Adyar, 6.45 p.m.

CULTURE

Tamil Nadu Music and Fine Arts University, Chennai and South Zone Cultural Centre, Thanjavur: Inauguration of conference on ‘Naveena Sampradaya’, Minister K. C. Veeramani participates, D.G.S. Dinakaran Salai, R.A. Puram, 9 a.m.

GENERAL

Anna University: 36{+t}{+h}convocation, Governor K. Rosaiah and Minister P. Palaniappan participate, Guindy, 5.30 p.m.

The Cell Press – TNQ India Distinguished Lectureship Series 2016: Professor Karl Deisseroth speaks on “Illuminating the Brain,” Sir Mutha Venkatasubba Rao Auditorium, Chetpet, 6 p.m.

Department of Zoology – University of Madras: Lecture on ‘Assessment of human antibodies and their isotypes by immunoassays – secondary antibodies as critical factors’, Guindy Campus, 2.30 p.m.

Dr. Ambedkar Centre for Economic Studies – University of Madras: Lecture of ‘Babasaheb Dr. B. R. Ambedkar’s vision for democratic social transformation’, Chepauk, 3 p.m.

Karur Vysya Bank: Inauguration of Chennai – Besant Nagar branch, T-27, 7{+t}{+h}Avenue, Besant Nagar, 10 a.m.

Valliammai Engineering College: Programme on ‘EC6651 – Communication Engineering’, Kattankulathur, 9 a.m.

Rotary Club of Madras East: Presentation of ‘Vocational Excellence Award’, Crowne Plaza, 6.45 p.m.

Narcotics Anonymous: Meeting, Staying Clean Group, St. Lourdes Church, Don Bosco School, Perambur, 7 p.m.

Al-Anon: Meetings, Police Community Hall, Kondithope, Walltax Rd.; Shrine of Divine Mercy Church, Anna Nagar East, Near Chinthamani; St. Andrews Church, Gandhi Rd., Guduvancherry; Ambedkar Manram, Ashok Nagar; The Lady of the Light Church, Luz, Mylapore; Jacob MHSS., Judges Colony, Periakuppam, Tiruvallur, 7 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meetings, Loyola MHSS., United India Colony, Kodambakkam; St. Lukes Church, Anna Nagar; Anglo Indian Association, Ponniyamman Koil St., Egmore; Annai Velankanni Church, Besant Nagar; C.S.I. Good Shepherd Church, Taramani Link Rd., Velachery; Kondithope Community Centre, Police Quarters, Walltax Rd.; St. Mathias Church, Kamarajar Salai, K.K. Nagar; C.S.I. Church, Moolakadai; and The Lady of the Light Church, Luz Church Rd., Mylapore, 7 p.m.
title: MRR/CHENNAI TODAY FOR JANUARY 20 (WEDNESDAY) FOR CHENNAI CITY FOR PAGE 4
